chat.msg: Welcome!
Hi
Hello! I'm the navigator, ready to follow your instructions. Where should we go first?
Let's go
Sorry, I didn't catch the instruction you provided. Where would you like me to go on the map?
Anywhere
Okay, at the starting point I see a twig branching out towards the left. Should I take it or head in a different direction?
Okay
I apologize, I'm not sure I understand. Could you please clarify which direction I should take, or where to go on the map?
Birds area
Great! From the starting point, I will head towards the big island on the left. On the island, there is a parrot sitting on a tree. Should I continue forward on this island or explore somewhere else?
And then tiger area

Understood! From the parrot's location, I will head towards the bottom-left corner of the map, where there is a Small Island with a Tiger on it. Should I explore it, or is there another direction you'd like me to take?
Yes I like

Alright, now I'm on the small island with the Tiger. There is another small island southeast of me, with a Butterfly on it, and a big island southwest of me, with an Elephant on it. Which way should we go?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Let's start
Fristly, which area best?
What's happen?
Why you don't talk to me?
Great! What do you see on the map right now?
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean by "which area best?" Could you please clarify that question?
I apologize if I gave you that impression, I'm here and ready to help you navigate the map. Can you please tell me what you see on your screen?
I'm not sure what has happened, but I'm here to help you navigate the map correctly. Can you please describe what you see on your screen so I can assist you?
This pool

I'm sorry, but I cannot see what you are seeing on your screen, as I am an AI language model. Can you please describe what you see on the map? If you are unsure of your location, you can refer to the original description of the map that I provided earlier.
Dear area
I'm sorry, but I'm still not sure I understand what you mean by "dear area". Can you please describe your current location on the map or tell me what you see around you?

chat.msg: Welcome!
Hello
Hello! What can I help you with today?
Let's go map
Great, where would you like to start on the map?
Firstly the burns area

Sure. I am currently standing at a tent at the northern part of the map. From the tent, I can see a dog sitting south of me, to the left of a fire. To the right of the fire, there is a red mushroom and then there is a blue car. Do I need to travel south from here to get to the burns area?
Yes

Got it. Now I am walking south from the tent, past a dog, left of the fire. I am stopping at the red mushroom that's to the right of the fire. From here I can see a blue car to the south. Should I continue south to reach the burns area or go in another direction?
The house area

Okay, so I need to head west from here to get to the house area. I am now walking towards the blue car and continuing south until I reach a blue telescope. From the telescope, I will turn left and head west toward a wooden house. Are we on the right track to get to the house area?
yes this is  the right track.
Great! I have arrived at the wooden house in the west. So that means we have reached the house area. *finished*
